title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, March 18, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of Wilfred Owen (1893), one of the first poets to depict the horrifying realities of war as opposed to the patriotic aspects. He died in the Great War at age 25.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of Wilfred Owen (1893), one of the first poets to depict the horrifying realities of war as opposed to the patriotic aspects. He died in the Great War at age 25.
